#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdio>
#include <map>
#include <cmath>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <memory.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <string>
#include <stack>
#include <vector>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <bitset>
#include <stdlib.h>

using namespace std;

#define FOR(i,a,b) for (int i = int(a); i <= b; i++)
#define INF 1000000000
#define mod 1000000007
#define ll long long int
// #define inp(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define inchar getchar_unlocked
 
inline void inp( int &n )
{
n=0;
int ch=inchar();int sign=1;
while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=inchar();}
while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=inchar();
n=n*sign;
}


int main() {

    int n,siz=0,prev=0,neww;
    inp(n);
    priority_queue< int, vector<int>, greater<int> > pq1;
    priority_queue<int> pq2;
    while(n--)
     {
        int x,y;
        inp(x);
        if(x == 1)
         {
           siz++;
           neww = siz/3;  
           inp(y);
           pq2.push(y);
           if(neww>prev)
            {
              int val = pq2.top();pq2.pop();
              pq1.push(val);           
            }
           else
            {
                                       
               if(!pq1.empty() &&  pq2.top()>pq1.top())
                {
                  int val = pq2.top();pq2.pop();
                  pq1.push(val);  
                  val = pq1.top();pq1.pop();
                  pq2.push(val);                   
                }                            
            } 
           prev = neww;
               
         }
         else
          {
            if(pq1.empty()) printf("No reviews yet\n");
            else printf("%d\n",pq1.top());     
          }        
     }
   
    
    
    //getchar();
    //getchar();
	return 0;
}
